title: Deep Rock Galactic
notes: Has sound clicking and constant frame drops down to single digits. (Worked fine with WINE+DXVK outside of proton)

title: Deep Rock Galactic
notes: Lags when swarm attacks, no crashes though. / Minigun spends ammo but they may not spawn and damage enemies (cant see), maybe cant host lobby / Lowest settings and 100% resolution scale (I dont want to lower it to pixels...)

For nvidia cards you'll need a file ~/.dxvk.conf with the following 2 lines:
dxgi.customDeviceId = E366
dxgi.customVendorId = 1002

if you have audio cracking problems use this command to install xact:
env WINEPREFIX="/home/$USER/.steam/SteamApps/compatdata/548430/pfx" WINEPATH="~/.steam/SteamApps/common/Proton 3.7 Beta/dist/bin" winetricks xact

and you'll also most likely to increase the ulimit for NOFILES like it is described here:
https://github.com/zfigura/wine/blob/esync/README.esync

After these tweaks the game runs flawless at about 90 fps on my setup.
title: Deep Rock Galactic

notes:
I forgot to add my launch options in the report before, so here they are:

DXVK_CONFIG_FILE=~/.dxvk.conf %command%

the other  steps are to create a file ~/.dxvk.conf with the follwoing two lines:
dxgi.customDeviceId = E366
dxgi.customVendorId = 1002

and also run this command to install xact, which fixes the audio cracking errors:
env WINEPREFIX="/home/$USER/.steam/SteamApps/compatdata/548430/pfx" WINEPATH="~/.steam/SteamApps/common/Proton 3.7 Beta/dist/bin" winetricks xact

last but not least increase the ulimits for NOFILES according to this tutorial and reboot afterwards:
https://github.com/zfigura/wine/blob/esync/README.esync
title: Deep Rock Galactic

gpu: X.Org AMD Radeon (TM) RX 460 Graphics (POLARIS11, DRM 3.23.0, 4.15.0-34-generic, LLVM 8.0.0)
notes: At the first try, sound was clicking, but after changing default_fragments line in etc/pulse/daemon.conf from 4 to 8, clicking went away. However, now I can hear everything in game, whether it is close or far. I can hear other players, mule, enemies no matter where they are and its really confusing. Performance-wise, it's not up to par with Wİndows version, but it's not bad either. There are microstutters everywhere, but for an unofficial game, runs fairly nicely. Managed to play an online game as well, not problems there.
title: Deep Rock Galactic

gpu: X.Org Radeon RX 580 Series (POLARIS10, DRM 3.26.0, 4.18.0-sabayon, LLVM 6.0.1)
notes: Sound issues involving clicking and no audio scaling - distance- or settings-wise. Apart from that it runs perfectly fine.
title: Deep Rock Galactic

notes: works great, needed the dxvk configuration, which is added below
title: Deep Rock Galactic

notes: After some tests, audio crackling a bit, only way i found to figure it is to put master volume to 28% and effect to 1% (strange but work here). Performances are perfect
title: Deep Rock Galactic

notes: Need "xact" from winetricks and general pulseaudio optimization (google about "tsched=0" module and general latency/priority tweaks) to fix audio. If game crash after installing xact - also install “vcrun2017” trick and change windows version with “winecfg” trick to “Windows 10” (important). That also fix stuttering on nvidia cards without needs to “fake” other vendor.
title: Deep Rock Galactic
